name: Robo On the Run
description:
Controls: Place and break blocks with mouse and use spacebar to change block to place.

A little about us:
This is our biggest game and our first game jam ever by Mr Budders (Programmer) and Jetpack Chicken (Artist) I hope you enjoy.

Link to Jetpack Chickens other work:
https://www.pixilart.com/jetpack-chicken/gallery
